FandomActivity

Interface FandomActivityListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FandomActivityAdapter

    public interface FandomActivityListener
    This class can be used to receive notifications whenever a recent change or a post happened.
    Use FandomActivityAdapter.FandomActivityAdapter(String) to set a timestamp offset.
    Author:
    Mika Thein
    See Also:
    FandomActivityAdapter, recentChangeHappened(FandomRecentChange), postHappened(FandomPost), somethingHappened(FandomActivityElement)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postHappened(FandomPost post)
      Whenever a post happens.
      void recentChangeHappened(FandomRecentChange recentChange)
      Whenever a recent change happens.
      void somethingHappened(FandomActivityElement activityElement)
      Whenever a post or a recent change happens.

    • Method Detail

      • recentChangeHappened

        void recentChangeHappened(FandomRecentChange recentChange)
        Whenever a recent change happens.
        Parameters:

        See Also:
        FandomRecentChange, FandomEdit, FandomLog, FandomNew

        See Also:
